eu.toolchain.concurrent

Interface ReloadableManaged<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the object being managed
    All Superinterfaces:
    Managed<T>

    public interface ReloadableManaged<T>
extends Managed<T>
    Managed lightweight, reference-counted objects that can be reloaded.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface eu.toolchain.concurrent.Managed

        CAPTURE_STACK, TRACING

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Stage<Void> reload()
      Reload the underlying reference.

      • Methods inherited from interface eu.toolchain.concurrent.Managed

        borrow, doto, isReady, start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • reload

        Stage<Void> reload()
        Reload the underlying reference.

        The new reference will be constructed and started before the old one is shut down.

        Returns:
        a stage that will be completed once the reference has been reloaded
